name: Aurora Weathery Pattern
desc:
You can only control 1 "Aurora Weathery Pattern". "Weathery" Effect Monsters in your Main Monster Zone in the same column as this card, and Main Monster Zones adjacent to that zone, gain this effect.
‚óè When exactly 1 card is added to either player's hand (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card; banish that card, and if you do, that player draws 1 card.
